text: The Signal may refer to: * The Signal (radio program), a Canadian radio program * The Signal (Sandra Nasic album), the debut solo album of German singer Sandra Nasic * The Signal (Urthboy album), the second album from The Herd member Urthboy * "The Signal", a season-four episode of the British- American animated television series The Amazing World of Gumball ==Newspapers== * The Santa Clarita Valley Signal, a news media organization in Santa Clarita, California * The Signal (college newspaper), the official student newspaper of Georgia State University * The Signal, The College of New Jersey's student-run newspaper since 1855
title: The Signal
